channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine anti-corruption chief says his agency faces 'dirty information campaign'
Israel says hundreds of truckloads of aid are waiting to enter Gaza. Why can't the UN bring them in?
Fed's Next Move: BlackRock's Rogal, Wolfe Research's Roth
US, China confront each other on Ukraine at United Nations
A science journal pulled a controversial study about a bizarre life form against the authors' wishes
Trump says he's considering rebate checks for Americans based on tariffs
item.description: President Trump said he's considering using money generated by U.S. tariffs to offer a "little rebate" to Americans.

item.title: 9-year-old dies at Hersheypark in Pennsylvania
item.description: A 9-year-old child has died after an incident at The Boardwalk inside Hersheypark in Pennsylvania, Hersheypark’s CEO has confirmed.

item.title: 9-year-old dies after incident at Hersheypark's water park, CEO says
item.description: A 9-year-old child has died after an incident at The Boardwalk water park at Hersheypark in Hershey, Pennsylvania, on Thursday.

item.title: In Epstein furor, Trump struggles to shake off a controversy his allies once stoked
item.description: President Donald Trump faces ongoing questions about the Jeffrey Epstein case, overshadowing his administration’s achievements.

item.title: WATCH: Disgraced congressman George Santos to begin sentence
item.description: Scandal-plagued former Rep. George Santos is set to report to federal prison to begin a seven-year sentence for wire fraud and identity theft.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump does not rule out pardon for Ghislaine Maxwell
item.description: President Trump initially dodged the question about the possibility of granting clemency for convicted Jeffrey Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell aft...

item.title: "Doomsday mom" Lori Vallow Daybell receives new life sentences
item.description: Lori Vallow Daybell has been sentenced to life in prison on two murder conspiracy convictions in Arizona.

item.title: Deportation flights from Florida’s ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ detention center have begun, DeSantis says
What did Lori Vallow Daybell do? A timeline of the case
item.description: A Phoenix jury has convicted Lori Vallow Daybell of conspiracy in the murder of her estranged husband Charles Vallow.

item.title: A man is stopped climbing the US-Mexico border wall. Under new Trump rules, US troops sound the alarm
Deportation flights from Florida's "Alligator Alcatraz" underway, DeSantis says
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis said deportation flights from the so-called"Alligator Alcatraz" immigration detention facility had begun. CBS News Miami rep...

item.title: 'Doomsday mom' Lori Daybell given 2 life sentences in murder conspiracy trials
item.description: The so-called doomsday mom was found guilty of two counts of conspiracy to commit first-degree murder in two separate trials in Maricopa County.

item.title: Trump administration releasing $6 billion in education funding it withheld
item.description: The $6 billion in education programming frozen by the Trump administration earlier this month is being released, according to a Department of Educatio...
